clinical_history: Patient with bone pain and prior cancer history.
findings: Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in left lung lower lobe with SUVmax 9.17.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in left lung lower lobe, suggestive of malignancy.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
recommendations: Repeat PET-CT in 3–6 months to monitor treatment response.
